inclusion.criterion: peak aortic jet velocity of >2.5 m/s on Doppler echocardiography
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: grade 2-4 calcification of the aortic valve on echocardiography
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Anticipated or planned aortic valve surgery in the next 6 months,
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function and EF of 25%. He underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
